UserShare.name: UserShare
UserShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on a user record.

IsActive.description: Read-only. Indicates whether the User has access to log in (true) or not (false). You can modify a User's active status from the user interface or via the API.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the User or Group has to the specified user. The specified user is denoted by the UserId. The possible values are: Read Edit This field must be set to an access level that is at least equal to the organization’s default UserAccessLevel. UserAccessLevel can be updated only if RowCause is set to Manual Sharing.

UserId.description: ID of the User being shared.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the User or Group that has been given access to the User. This field can’t be updated.
